review: Pretty neat little device. I love the remote, fits nicely in your hand and can always find the buttons.
author: Marissa Suri

review: Purchased this to replace a Roku on my main T.V.  Love it!  Easy to use, excellent streaming, and as a Prime member, I love that it automatically connects to all of my Prime music and video selections.  Very reasonable price.  I recently removed cable services from two secondary sets.  I moved the Roku to one that is rarely used, and purchased a second Firestick for the other.  Given an option for an initial purchase...I would purchase Firestick without question.  Very pleased.
author: pookie
